entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 2 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain at times heavy along parts of the coast. Rainfall amount 20 mm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
